attributes.action: take our army out of Iraq
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to..take our army out of Iraq 
as i feel our people are being killed for nothing, and it doesnt seem to be doing any thing to help any more.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
